definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from the volcanic cloud.
sentences.chinese: 成群的马匹正飞奔逃离火山熔岩灰雾。

sentences.english: An article, such as toothpaste or a hairbrush, used in personal grooming or dressing.
sentences.chinese: 一种用来梳刷马匹的带有金属齿的梳子。

sentences.english: And other neighbor with the horses at a distance.
sentences.chinese: 远观其他邻居和马匹也不错。

sentences.english: The neck should be raised and arched, the nose line vertical.
sentences.chinese: 马匹颈部高抬弓弯，头部的鼻线垂直。

sentences.english: Cinderella was astonished as the mice changed into horses.
sentences.chinese: 当这些老鼠变成马匹的时候，灰姑娘感到吃惊。

sentences.english: There is no treatment or vaccine available for either people or horses.
sentences.chinese: 没有能够用于人类或马匹的疗法或疫苗。
他给自己的马匹烙上了印痕。

sentences.english: Only a hundred years ago, the automobile and the airplane replaced the horse.
sentences.chinese: 就在一百多年前，汽车和飞机取代了马匹。

sentences.english: He rushed to his horse. Hallam followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他奔到他的马匹处，赫廉跟在他的身后。

sentences.english: The cheesemonger woke when they stopped to change the horses and sent for a fresh hamper.
sentences.chinese: 在换马匹和派人找一个新的大篮子时，奶酪商醒了。

sentences.english: He was said to have kept horses for the gentlemen outside the playhouses .
sentences.chinese: 据说，他当时在剧院外为绅士们照看马匹。

sentences.english: That helped their ponies run longer and faster.
sentences.chinese: 这样有助于他们的马匹跑得距离更长，时速更快。

sentences.english: His job is to coordinate all aspects of having horses on a movie set.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作是电影制作组中负责协调各方面的马匹。

sentences.english: The engine and horses are displayed on a street with street lights and a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 引擎和马匹都显示在一街与街灯和一个消防栓。

sentences.english: A caisson is a wagon pulled by horses.
sentences.chinese: 弹药箱是由马匹来拉的。

sentences.english: The feed access opening accommodates entry of a horse's head into the feeding chamber.
sentences.chinese: 访问开放的饲料可容纳马匹的头部进入了饲养室。
